name: Xmas Festival Fury
description:
Christmas festivities are getting a bit out of hand!

Dodge and weave between icicles, pine needles, and other furious festivities, as you try to restore the central Christmas Tree to working order. Simply move around with WASD / Joystick and bounce gift-boxes into the Tree to progress!

There are three difficulty levels that unlock as you progress -- Level 3 is particularly difficult, so be warned :)

This game was created for the Jame Gam: Christmas Edition 2022

Merry Christmas & Happy Holidays!

Credits:
